Name: Pieces of Beauty 3
About the game: Enjoy a good time with this japanese themed jigsaw game. Entertain yourself discovering the fabulous style of Ohara Koson, a world-renowned japanese artist of the late 19th and early 20th centuries. Featuring: - Amazing background music selected to enrich your gameplay experience - A total of 14 jigsaw puzzles made from incredible fine art pieces
